contents.text: After all these years, I simply must admit the truth...

Even without the power of flight,
Link made his way to this Divine Beast...
And accomplished something that even I could not...
Now we wait for that perfect moment...
I hope that luck holds out, Link...

You'll have a precise bead on Ganon
from this vantage point.

And when the time is right,
give him everything you've got!

Medoh, we've been artfully patient
for the last 100 years.

I doubt you'll suffer a feather
over a few more moments...
